haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Ltn Patrik Schorner, Ltn Patrik Schorner
Fw Waldemar Ganz, Fw Waldemar Ganz

 The mission was flown from Bellevue Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 08/02/1916 near Forges-sur-Meuse.
A truck was destroyed by Patrik Schorner of FA 293b.
Patrik Schorner and Herbert Klemm were  flying a DFW C.V.

On 08/02/1916 near Verdun aerodrom.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.48 was brought down by Urs Kehlmann of FA 293b.
S/Lt Jacob Daucourt was killed in action.
Urs Kehlmann was  flying a DFW C.V.
narrative: A bombing attack on enemy troop transport.  I manage to blow up a truck before turning for home.
